input.sentences: [female] loved her city . from the orange sherbet colored building to the regal palm trees .
she lived in an elegant apartment building .
she had an easy walk to view the river .
going to the open market was invigorating and fun .
she always enjoyed a pasta and bean dish while at the market . it was a perfect end to a shopping spree .
output.sentences: Next to the trees and the sherbet shop there stands regal looking building.
We lived in the elegant building across the street.
I remember the short walk North we took to get a good view of the river.
That day we went to the market was invigorating and fun.
The last day of your life we went on a spree of shopping and perfect conversation.
